page.title: 14Arbroath Academy.
page.content: Arbroath Academy is a six-year compre- hensive school. Our roll at the beginning of session 1984-85 was 950 pupils and 70 members of staff. As a comprehensive school, we cater for pupils of very different abilities from a wide range of background. At one extreme we have a group of mildly mentally handicapped children who belong to our Special Education Unit. At the other end of the ability range we have pupils preparing for Higher Education in Colleges and Universiti We try to encourage pupils to develop a wide range of interests through extra-curricular activities. We try to prepare them for the world they will enter when they leave school.All this we try to do within a framework which will allow pupils to live and work happily together.
